text: Polyrhaphis pilosa is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Lane in 1965. It is known from Bolivia, Ecuador, Guyana, French Guiana, Peru and Suriname.BioLib.cz - Polyrhaphis pilosa. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1965
title: Polyrhaphis pilosa
